name: The Hidden Heroes
description:
The Hidden Heroes is a 3D serious board game developed by Reko Smith.

The aim of the game is to learn more about young carers and what they experience throughout their childhood.

The board that you play on simulates different childhood lifestages for a young carer: they go from primary school to secondary school, college then university.

Your aim: is to get around the board and remain the last one standing. The dice rolls are completely random and how you increase or decrease your energy pts will therefore be random.

This is to represent what a young carer's life is like... sometimes it can be random.

When you land on a tile, you are either increasing or decreasing your energy points. Energy points represent the energy that a young carer has, to do the things they do on a daily basis. The cards are randomised from a list, and when you draw a card, they represent a situation that a young carer goes through.

Instructions are provided as to how you can play the game.

Have fun, and I hope you enjoy the game.

This game is in active development.
